name: restifiedts
description: Production-grade TypeScript API testing framework with fluent DSL

scripts.test:enterprise-scale: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register enterprise-scale-test.ts --reporter ./dist/reporting/restified-html-reporter.js --timeout 15000 --no-config
scripts.report:html: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register 'examples/**/*.ts' --reporter ./dist/reporting/restified-html-reporter.js && echo "ğŸ“Š RestifiedTS HTML report generated. Check console output for location."
scripts.report:html:unit: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register 'tests/unit/**/*.spec.ts' --reporter ./src/reporting/restified-html-reporter.ts && echo "ğŸ“Š Unit tests HTML report generated."
scripts.report:html:integration: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register 'tests/integration/**/*.spec.ts' --reporter ./src/reporting/restified-html-reporter.ts && echo "ğŸ“Š Integration tests HTML report generated."
scripts.report:html:all: npm run build && mocha -r ts-node/register 'tests/**/*.spec.ts' --reporter ./src/reporting/restified-html-reporter.ts && echo "ğŸ“Š All tests HTML report generated."
scripts.report:allure: mocha -r ts-node/register --reporter allure-mocha 'examples/**/*.ts' && echo "ğŸ“Š Allure report generated. Run 'allure serve allure-results' to view"
scripts.examples: npm run test:examples && npm run report:html
scripts.demo:reporter: npm run test:quick && echo "ğŸ‰ Demo complete! Check restified-reports/ folder for the generated HTML report."
scripts.reports:clean: rimraf reports mochawesome-report test-reports allure-results output test-output restified-reports raj-reports
scripts.docs:serve: echo "ğŸ“š Documentation available at:" && echo "  ğŸ“– Main README: README.md" && echo "  ğŸ“š Documentation Hub: docs/README.md" && echo "  ğŸ¢ Enterprise Features: docs/ENTERPRISE-FEATURES.md"
scripts.docs:validate: echo "âœ… Validating documentation links..." && node -e "console.log('ğŸ“ All documentation files organized and accessible')"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
